content.description: Researchers claimed that a particular organelle originated from a free-living prokaryotic cell that was engulfed by a larger cell, as shown in Figure 1.
content.question: Figure 1. A model showing a cell engulfing a smaller cell Which of the following provides evidence to best support the researchersâ€™ claim?

choices.label: The organelle has a phospholipid membrane.
The organelle has protein in the membrane.
The organelle has a double membrane.
The organelle has an internal aqueous environment that is similar to the cytosol of the larger cell.

content.answer: The organelle has a double membrane.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
